mapper.select: select id,name,logo,owner from tbl_object where user_id = #{id}

select m.id,m.name,m.menu_logo,m.menu_type,m.level,ms.id ms_id,ms.name ms_name,ms.url ms_url,ms.menu_type ms_type,ms.menu_parent from tbl_menu m left join tbl_menu_second ms on m.id = ms.menu_parent left join tbl_menu_project mp on ms.id = mp.mid where mp.oid = #{id} order by m.level asc, m.id asc, ms.id asc;

select m.id,m.name,m.menu_logo,m.menu_type,m.level,ms.id ms_id,ms.name ms_name,ms.url ms_url,ms.menu_type ms_type,ms.menu_parent,ms.obid from tbl_menu m left join tbl_menu_second ms on m.id = ms.menu_parent where m.menu_type = 1 and (ms.menu_type = 1 or ms.menu_type is null ) order by m.level asc, m.id asc, ms.id asc;

select m.id,m.name,m.menu_logo,m.menu_type,m.level,ms.id ms_id,ms.name ms_name,ms.url ms_url,ms.menu_type ms_type,ms.menu_parent,ms.obid from tbl_menu m left join tbl_menu_second ms on m.id = ms.menu_parent order by m.level asc;
select * from tbl_object order by status asc,user_id asc
select count(id) from tbl_object where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_object set hold_date = DATE_ADD(hold_date, INTERVAL #{param2} MONTH) where id = #{param1}
mapper.select: select id,logo,name,hold_date from tbl_object where id = #{id}

select m.id,m.name,mp.id mp_id,o.name o_name,o.logo o_logo from tbl_menu_project as mp right join tbl_menu_second as m on mp.mid=m.id left join tbl_object as o on mp.oid = o.id where m.menu_type <> 1 order by m.obid asc
select count(id) from tbl_menu_project where mid = #{param1} and oid=#{param2}
mapper.update: update tbl_object set logo = #{param2} where id = #{param1}
